title: Барабашка
overview: A comedy series with Anton Filipenko and Olga Dibtseva about a brownie who forces the owner of the apartment to unwittingly solve the accumulated problems. Artyom is quarantined at home alone and notices something strange: things are out of place, food disappears right from under his nose, and an indecent message appears on the refrigerator. Trying to understand the situation, the hero realizes that he has an invisible neighbor. While Artyom is fighting the hated lamb, relatives suspect him of insanity. Problems grow like a snowball, and Artyom needs to unravel this tangle of contradictions.
